T

TCPHandler - Class in Underlay.TCP
Represents a thread that handles an incoming TCP request and emits a response.
TCPHandler(Socket, TCPUnderlay) - Constructor for class Underlay.TCP.TCPHandler
 
TCPListener - Class in Underlay.TCP
Implements a routine that continuously listens a local TCP port and delegates the handling of each received request to a `TCPHandler` thread.
TCPListener(ServerSocket, TCPUnderlay) - Constructor for class Underlay.TCP.TCPListener
